Button.TooltipReference: Hides a corpse after you have looted it
Toggles Zeal's mouse look smoothing
Changes the blue con color to usercolor #70 which is otherwise unused, you can edit in the options window.
Shows message timestamps
Toggles the zeal input setup for any input in game, giving you a more modern input (ctrl+c, ctrl+v, left, right, shift left+right for highlighting, home, end ect)
Toggles your helmet
Stops windows from closing on escape but still drops target
Alt key will show ALL item Tooltips in open bags
Toggles Autostand if Spellbook is open (so you can turn pages with movement keys)
Toggles floating combat damage numbers
Uses the previous versions sensitivity adjustments for mouse look
Toggles Target Rings
Toggles Target Rings Attack Indicator
Always rotate the target ring the same direction as the targets heading
Pressing Escape will not close the raid window when this option is enabled.
Toggles on and off the 50+ class names on /who and other areas
Toggles Tell Windows
Adds custom coloring to raid, group, afk and ld
Renders npc names in the color of your con
Toggles the map overlay
Shows group members on map
Shows raid members on map
